document.title: Simple Upper Arch Treatment with Aligners
document.summary: This is a straightforward case using clear aligners to treat the upper teeth. The treatment is expected to take around 4 to 6 months with progress mainly monitored remotely. Some attachments will be utilized to assist with tooth movement, but whitening is not included in this plan.
key_points: Simple case using clear aligners for the upper teeth
next_steps: Ensure attachments are prepared for expected aligner stages
Communicate treatment plan specifics to patient
